description:
Designed to keep you moving fast and light down the trial, the BioSync suspension system mirrors your natural body movements. It’s hydration-compatible so you don’t have to stop and pull out your water bottle on a quick hike, and the back panel allows flow-through ventilation for a cool, comfortable back.

  • 100-denier HD nylon body fabric with 210-denier nylon at the base for abrasion resistance and a PFC-Free DWR finish for weather protection
  • BioSync hipbelt and shoulder harness stretches and flexes with your movement
  • Backpanel features aerodynamic grooves which allows air flow to keep your back cooler
  • Adjustable torso length lets you dial in the fit
  • Dual side stretch mesh pockets and side compression to secure external gear
  • Top quick access pocket and large hipbelt pockets provide secure, easy to access to essentials
  • Front vertical zippered pocket with external bungee for stashing an extra layer
  • Hydration sleeve with SpeedClip hydration hanger, compatible with Gregory's 3D Hydro reservoirs (reservoir not included)
  • Trekking pole attachment with adjustable upper bungee loops
  • Front reflective light attachment loop and reflective gear loops
  • Designed for loads up to 13.6kg/30lbs
name: Gregory Miko 30 Daypack - Unisex
